Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அஞ்சுவ தோரும் அறனே ஒருவனை வஞ்சிப்ப தோரும் அவா.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: It is the chief duty of (an ascetic) to watch against desire with (jealous) fear; for it has power to deceive (and destroy) him.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A wise ascetic stands guard vigilantly, holding a shield of light. Their gaze is fixed on a shadowy threat.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The threat is a beautiful, alluring, shape-shifting entity made of shadow and smoke, representing Desire ('அவா'). It subtly tries to offer tempting illusions (wealth, power) to deceive the ascetic.
Layered_Composition.Background: A serene and sacred space, like a peaceful hermitage, which the ascetic is protecting from the deceptive intrusion of desire.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: An ascetic's constant vigilance against the deceptive nature of Desire, portrayed as a cunning and beautiful foe that must be feared and guarded against as a matter of virtue ('அறன்').
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The shield of light represents righteous fear and vigilance. The shape-shifting nature of the desire-entity symbolizes its power to deceive ('வஞ்சிப்பது').
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The ascetic and their shield glow with a pure, white light. The desire-entity is made of dark, swirling purples and blacks, with hypnotic, iridescent patterns. The background is lit by soft, natural moonlight.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Medium close-up, dramatic angle, focusing on the confrontation between the ascetic and the manifestation of desire.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with ethereal and smoky visual effects for the desire entity.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High contrast lighting, with the ascetic's shield casting a protective light that repels the encroaching shadows.

Cultural_Anchors: Fear of desire ('அஞ்சுவது') as a virtue ('அறன்')

Negative_Prompt: ascetic looking tempted, desire as a simple human figure, bright daylight, text artifacts, cartoonish.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the form of the desire entity.
